Lepoard: You need a receiver capable of DTS audio in order to not get Cinavia messages.  You are probably converting to AC3.  ALL SONY pictures will have Cinavia as well.  AS of now, PS3 cannot detect Cinavia over DTS.  I enjoy ALL these movies with DTS 3/2.1 sound tracks.  Do not blame the torrent owner, when YOU don't have the means to do it right.  You CANNOT remove cinavia, so it's not HIS fault...

@puunjab

Did it occur to you, that before going on your uninformed tirade on the uploader, that the film is anamorphic 2.35:1 aspect ratio - as seen in many feature releases nowadays?

That is to say - At 1280x720, the film will be in letterbox and be at its full aspect ratio.

So before you go calling someone a lying sack of shit - realize that the film is intended to be viewed at a 720p resolution with letterbox. 

A full screen 720p image would involve either zooming the picture and cutting off the ACTUAL picture at the sides, ruining the composition or at the very least stretching the image. either way you would be compromising on picture quality.
